about_the_game:
Kira is back! In this arcade style shoot ´em up you´ll encounter different foes, defeat big alien bosses and collect power-ups and new weapons to fight your way through exciting stages and find the holy bone Kira (the star of the game) is looking for.

This game features hand placed enemy waves throughout the game, a digitized Bordercollie and bossfights at the end of each stage. Try the demo now!
detailed_description:
Kira is back! In this arcade style shoot ´em up you´ll encounter different foes, defeat big alien bosses and collect power-ups and new weapons to fight your way through exciting stages and find the holy bone Kira (the star of the game) is looking for.

This game features hand placed enemy waves throughout the game, a digitized Bordercollie and bossfights at the end of each stage. Try the demo now!
name: BorderCollie Game 2 - Bordercollie Blaster Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Pentium®IV 1.5 GHz oder Athlon® XP 1500+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 100% DirectX® 9.0b kompatible 64 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% Soundblaster or compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Pentium®IV 1.5 GHz oder Athlon® XP 1500+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 100% DirectX® 9.0b kompatible 64 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% Soundblaster or compatible
